events.title: The Ultimate Guide to Choosing Decorative Cushions: Comfort, Style, and Selection Tips
events.content: Discover everything you need to know about cushions - from materials and styles to care tips. Find the perfect cushions to enhance your home comfort and style.

events.title: How to Choose and Style Seat Cushions for a Chic and Comfortable Home
events.content: Elevate your home decor with seat cushions. Our expert guide covers how to choose chair cushions, stylish design tips, and answers to common cushion questions.

events.title: Transform your space with the Quill Cushion Collection by Eilersen

events.title: Turn up the color. Turn up the comfort.
events.content:
Turn up the color. Turn up the comfort.
The Blaze Cushion Collection by Eilersen delivers an electrifying mix of color and craftsmanship. With striking pairings like Yellow/Beige, Teal/Beige, and Green/Blue, each cushion brings bold personality and refined Scandinavian design to your home.
Perfect for adding a modern edge to sofas, armchairs, or beds events.title: Outdoor Cushion Guide 2025: Styles, Materials & Trends for European Outdoors
events.content:

events.title: Fern cushion in Red/White
events.content:
Add movement and color to your seating with the Fern cushion in Red/White, featuring a striking diagonal stripe pattern that energizes any room.

events.title: Styling Sofa Cushions for Summer 2025
events.content:
Bring effortless elegance to your home with our 2025 summer sofa cushion styling guide, inspired by Scandinavian design. Whether you crave soft neutrals, airy textures, or playful contrasts, this guide shows you how to style your sofa for a calm, curated summer look.
Perfect for both indoor and covered outdoor spaces, these tips will help you mix and match like a designer.

events.title: Ruby Red Cliff pillow from Eilersen Cushion's collection
events.content:
Sometimes the smallest changes make the biggest impact in your home. This stunning Ruby Red Cliff pillow from Eilersen Cushion's collection is proof that one beautiful accent piece can transform your entire space.

events.title: 5 Outdoor Cushion Arrangement Ideas for Stylish Scandinavian Living
events.content:
Looking to refresh your patio, terrace, or garden lounge? Our latest guide shares 5 expert outdoor cushion arrangement ideas that bring Scandinavian elegance to your open-air spaces.

events.title: Eilersen Luna Pillows - Premium Scandinavian Design Cushions
events.content:
Curious about what makes the Eilersen Luna cushion collection so extraordinary? We're pulling back the curtain on one of our most beloved designs in our latest spotlight feature.
From the meticulous selection of premium materials to the thoughtful color combinations that define each piece, there's so much more to discover about these stunning checkerboard beauties. Learn about the Danish design philosophy behind every Luna cushion, the craftsmanship techniques passed down through generations, and why interior designers worldwide are choosing these pieces to transform their most important spaces.
Whether you're considering adding a Luna cushion to your home or simply love learning about exceptional design, this deep dive reveals the artistry and intention behind every detail. Plus, get insider tips on styling these versatile pieces in your own space.
Ready to discover the story behind the beauty? events.title: Eilersen Tent cushions in blue/burgundy
events.content:

Our Summit cushion in Midnight Blue creates an exquisite contrast against mustard yellow luxury sofas, transforming your living space into a sophisticated sanctuary. The diagonal ribbed texture adds depth and visual interest, while the rich midnight blue hue brings elegance and refinement to any room. events.content:
The art of subtle sophistication lies in the details. The varying pile heights and directional weaves catch light beautifully, creating an ever-changing canvas of golden warmth throughout your day.

events.title: Sage green is having a major moment in luxury interiors, and for good reason.
events.content:
Sage green is having a major moment in luxury interiors, and for good reason. This sophisticated, earthy hue brings an instant sense of calm and elegance to any space. Whether you're curating a Scandinavian-inspired living room or adding subtle color to a minimalist design, sage green pillows are the perfect starting point.
The secret to mastering this trend? It's all in the layering and texture play. Combine different shades of green with warm neutrals, introduce natural materials like linen and wool, and don't be afraid to mix patterns thoughtfully. The result? A space that feels both timeless and utterly current.
Ready to transform your living space with expert styling techniques? Our comprehensive guide reveals the insider secrets to creating magazine-worthy pillow arrangements that luxury designers swear by.
